Extension.name: preExitDebugger
Extension.initParam: This exit dumps all HTML params, CGI vars etc. to the console and can be used to debug a pre-processor exit.

Extension.name: postExitDebugger
Extension.initParam: This exit dumps all HTML params, CGI vars etc. to the console and can be used to debug a post-processor exit.

Extension.name: previewWorkflow
Extension.initParam: This used in workflow editor application. It takes the result document and transforms to another DTD that usable by the style sheet to generate the graphical view of the workflow.

Extension.name: authenticateUser
Extension.initParam: Authenticates current user for his role(s).

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: ContentID
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Content ID.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: UserName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Name of the current user.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: RoleNameList
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Comma separated list of roles this user is a member of.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: CheckInOutCondition
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Continue process if this condition is met. "ignore", "checkin" and "checkout" are allowed here.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: RequiredAccessLevel
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Minimum access level to authenticate the user. 1 - None, 2 - Reader and above, 3 - Assignee and above

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: WorkflowAppId
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Optional parameter, the id of the workflow used by the content item, used to check to see if user can create a new item.

Extension.name: disallowUpdatePublished
Extension.initParam: Does not allow updating a document that is in publish state.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: ContentID
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Content ID.

Extension.name: sendNotifications
Extension.initParam: Sends notifications to Roles/ad-hoc users about the transition.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: ContentID
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Content ID.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: UserName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Name of the current user.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: roleProviderRef
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Optional, a reference to the role cataloger used to lookup roles, roleAttributes and subjects.

Extension.name: prepareQueryFilter
Extension.initParam: Prepares filter(s) for the query depending on the roles the user is part of and stores in an HTML parameter.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: UserName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Name of the current user.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: RoleNameList
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Comma separated list of roles this user is a member of.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: ContentID
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Content ID.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: UserName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Name of the current user.

Extension.name: addPossibleTransitions
Extension.initParam: Appends possible transition to each of the status document.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: UserName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Name of the current user.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: StatusDocumentElementName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Node name (XML field name like root/document) of the status document.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: ContentIDNodeName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Node name (e.g. contentid or @contentid) of the content ID.

Extension.name: performTransition
Extension.initParam: Performs a valid transition and changes the content state accordingly.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: ContentID
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Content ID.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: UserName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Name of the current user.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: ActionTriggerName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Unique action trigger (checkin, checkout or any transition trigger).

Extension.name: nextNumber
Extension.initParam: Gets next number required for new unique IDs in the table inserts.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: htmlParamName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Name of the html parameter to return next number value.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: htmlParamKey
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Name of the key for which the number is attributed. This for example, can be the table name.

Extension.name: nextNumberMaxPP
Extension.initParam: Gets next number required for new unique IDs in the table inserts. This version does not use NEXTNUMBER table, instead it returns max. column value for the specified primary column +1. It starts from 1 for every new workflowid.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: htmlParamName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Name of the html parameter to return next number value.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: WorkflowID
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: WorkflowID that this table belongs to.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: TableName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Name of the table.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: PrimaryColumnName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Name of the primary column in the table.

Extension.name: sys_wfPreviewWorkflow
Extension.initParam: This used in workflow editor application. It takes the result document and transforms to another DTD that usable by the style sheet to generate the graphical view of the workflow.

Extension.name: sys_wfAuthenticateUser
Extension.initParam: Authenticates current user for his role(s).

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: ContentID
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Content ID.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: UserName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Name of the current user.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: RoleNameList
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Comma separated list of roles this user is a member of.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: CheckInOutCondition
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Continue process if this condition is met. "ignore", "checkin" and "checkout" are allowed here.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: RequiredAccessLevel
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Minimum access level to authenticate the user. 1 - None, 2 - Reader and above, 3 - Assignee and above

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: WorkflowAppId
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Optional parameter, the id of the workflow used by the content item, used to check to see if user can create a new item.

Extension.name: sys_wfDisallowUpdatePublished
Extension.initParam: Does not allow updating a document that is in publish state.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: ContentID
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Content ID.

Extension.name: sys_wfSendNotifications
Extension.initParam: Sends notifications to Roles/ad-hoc users about the transition.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: ContentID
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Content ID.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: UserName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Name of the current user.

Extension.name: sys_wfPrepareQueryFilter
Extension.initParam: Prepares filter(s) for the query depending on the roles the user is part of and stores in an HTML parameter.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: UserName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Name of the current user.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: RoleNameList
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Comma separated list of roles this user is a member of.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: ContentID
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Content ID.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: UserName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Name of the current user.

Extension.name: sys_wfAddPossibleTransitions
Extension.initParam: Adds a node to the result document that contains actions appropriate for this document, including checkin/out, edit, preview and transitions.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: UserName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Name of the current user.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: StatusDocumentElementName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Node name (XML field name like root/document) of the status document.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: ContentIDNodeName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Node name (e.g. contentid or @contentid) of the content ID.

Extension.name: sys_wfPerformTransition
Extension.initParam: Performs a valid transition and changes the content state accordingly.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: ContentID
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Content ID.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: UserName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Name of the current user.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: ActionTriggerName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Unique action trigger (checkin, checkout or any transition trigger).

Extension.name: sys_wfNextNumber
Extension.initParam: Gets next number required for new unique IDs in the table inserts.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: htmlParamName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Name of the html parameter to return next number value.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: htmlParamKey
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Name of the key for which the number is attributed. This for example, can be the table name.

Extension.name: sys_wfNextNumberSecondary
Extension.initParam: Gets next number required for new unique IDs in the table inserts. This version does not use NEXTNUMBER table, instead it returns max. column value for the specified primary column +1. It starts from 1 for every new workflowid.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: htmlParamName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Name of the html parameter to return next number value.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: WorkflowID
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: WorkflowID that this table belongs to.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: TableName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Name of the table.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: PrimaryColumnName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Name of the primary column in the table.

Extension.name: sys_wfGetCheckOutUserStatus
Extension.initParam: Returns a String that represents the status of the current document. Three values are possible: 0 - Not checked out 1 - Checked out by current user 2 - Checked out by another user

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: userName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: The name of the user that currently has the document checked out. Usually obtained from a backend column in the ContentStatus table.

Extension.name: sys_wfExecuteActions
Extension.initParam: Executes assigned workflow actions for the transition.

Extension.name: sys_wfAppendWorkflowActions
Extension.initParam: Appends a list of all workflow actions registered by the server to the result XML document. &lt;workflowactionlist&gt; element shall be a child of the root element in the document. Each action in the list shall be &lt;workflowaction&gt;.

Extension.name: sys_wfAddEditAuthFlag
Extension.initParam: Add flag to the activeitem element indicating if user can edit the content item

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: UserName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Name of the current user.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: RoleNameList
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Comma separated list of roles this user is a member of.

Extension.name: sys_wfGetAllowedTransitions
Extension.initParam: Adds a node to the result document that contains actions allowed by the user, including checkin/out, and transitions.

Extension.name: sys_wfDeleteContentTypeAssociations
Extension.initParam: Pre exit to delete the workflow associations with the content types when a workflow is deleted. Gets all the node definitions that have associations with the supplied workflow id in the form of request parameter named "workflowid". Deletes the workflow association from each node definition. If there is any error deleting the association, skips that node def and continues with the rest.
